title: Transform Excel data into AI-ready vectors with OpenAI and Supabase
description:
## Description
This workflow is a **practical, ‚Äúdirty‚Äù solution** for real-world scenarios where frontline workers keep using Excel in their daily processes.  
Instead of forcing change, we take their spreadsheets as-is, clean and normalize the data, generate embeddings, and store everything in Supabase.

The benefit: frontline staff continue with their familiar tools, while **data analysts gain clean, structured, and vectorized data** ready for analysis or RAG-style AI applications.

## How it works
- **Frontline workers continue with Excel** ‚Äì no disruption to their daily routines.  
- **Upload & trigger** ‚Äì The workflow runs when a new Excel sheet is ready.  
- **Read Excel rows** ‚Äì Data is pulled from the specified workbook and worksheet.  
- **Clean & normalize** ‚Äì HTML is stripped, Excel dates are fixed, and text fields are standardized.  
- **Batch & switch** ‚Äì Rows are split and routed into Question/Answer processing paths.  
- **Generate embeddings** ‚Äì Cleaned Questions and Answers are converted into vectors via OpenAI.  
- **Merge enriched records** ‚Äì Original business data is combined with embeddings.  
- **Write into Supabase** ‚Äì Data lands in a structured table (`excel_records`) with vector and FTS indexes.  

## Why it‚Äôs ‚Äúdirty but useful‚Äù
- **No disruption** ‚Äì frontline workers don‚Äôt need to change how they work.  
- **Analyst-ready data** ‚Äì Supabase holds clean, queryable data for dashboards, reporting, or AI pipelines.  
- **Bridge between old and new** ‚Äì Excel remains the input, but the backend becomes modern and scalable.  
- **Incremental modernization** ‚Äì paves the way for future workflow upgrades without blocking current work.  

## Outcome
Frontline workers keep their Excel-based workflows, while **data can immediately be structured, searchable, and vectorized in Supabase** ‚Äî enabling AI-powered search, reporting, and retrieval-augmented generation.


## Required setup

**Supabase account**
- Create a project and enable the **pgvector** extension. 

**OpenAI API Key** 
  - Required for generating embeddings (`text-embedding-3-small`).  

**Microsoft Excel credentials**
  - Needed to connect to your workbook and worksheet.  

- ## Need Help
üîó [LinkedIn ‚Äì Wessel Bulte](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wessel-bulte/)
